title: Devbox json definition
description: Defines fields and acceptable values of devbox.json

packages.description: A specification of packages to be installed via devbox.

items.description: Name and version of each package in name@version format.

oneOf.description: Name of each package in {"name": "version"} format.

.*.description: Version number of the package in this object.

oneOf.description: Name of each package in {"name": {"version": "1.2.3"}} format.

.*.description: Version number of the specified package in {"version": "1.2.3"} formmat.

env.description: List of additional environment variables to be set in devbox shell. Values can contain $PATH and $PWD.

shell.description: Definitions of scripts and actions to take when in devbox shell.

items.description: list of shell commands/scripts to run right after devbox shell starts.

scripts.description: List of commads/scripts definitions to run with `devbox run <script_name>` command.

items.description: command/script to run as part of a list of commands defined here.
